original_text: He shall recount his worthies: they shall stumble in their walk; they shall make haste to the wall thereof, and the defence shall be prepared.
korean_text: 그가 그의 존귀한 자들을 생각해 내니 그들이 엎드러질 듯이 달려서 급히 성에 이르러 막을 것을 준비하도다

sentences.original_text: they shall stumble in their walk;
they shall make haste to the wall thereof,
and the defence shall be prepared.
